Articles.Content:
I have an idea. Could you, Squad or a modder, allow the KAL-1000 to be used in EVA? I'm tired of having to switching on my ship to be able to switch on a KAL-1000 before reswitching on my Kerbal in EVA. Just being able to start the sequence would be enough, no need to give access to the programming of the KAL-1000 (At least, for kerbals who are not engineers).

Edited February 1, 2020 by Mortimer Kerman
